DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess lead implant success complication rate use Medtronic Attain Family left-heart lead delivery catheter .
DOC.criteria: Subject least 18 year age old Subject implant Medtronic cardiac resynchronization therapy ( CRT ) device Medtronic leave heart lead utilizing ( attempt utilize ) Attain Family delivery catheter . The implant procedure may include upgrade CRT implantable pulse generator ( IPG ) implantable cardioverterdefibrillator ( ICD ) . Subject enrol concurrent study exception study approve Medtronic Clinical Trial Leader prior enrollment Subject exist CRT system implant previously implant CRT system .
